features: The WD_BLACK C50 Expansion Card for Xbox leverages the Xbox Velocity Architecture and delivers the same performance as your Xbox Series X|S internal storage

As game file sizes grow, capacities from 512GB to 1TB* let you keep more of today’s top titles installed and ready to go. (* 1GB = 1 billion bytes and 1TB = 1 trillion bytes. Actual user capacity may be less depending on operating environment.)
This officially licensed Xbox expansion card is plug-and-play with your Xbox Series X|S, so you don’t have to worry about compatibility or opening your console to install.
The expansion card’s slick, industrial aesthetics deliver the cool factor that WD_BLACK is known for and fit in perfectly with your Xbox console.
Unlike solutions where you have to transfer Xbox Series X|S games back and forth to the console, the WD_BLACK C50 expansion card lets you keep games ready to play.
body.description: As game files get larger and larger, the WD_BLACK C50 Expansion Card for Xbox is the fast and easy way to give your Xbox Series X or Xbox Series S a big capacity boost so you can keep more titles installed. Just plug this officially licensed card directly into the dedicated slot on the back of your Xbox Series X|S console and it’s good to go, no extra software or installation steps needed. The card delivers the same performance as the Xbox internal storage for a seamless experience when you’re installing, loading, playing, and saving your favorite games. Keep your library ready to play and get into the action fast with the WD_BLACK C50 Expansion Card for Xbox.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: XBOX PERFORMANCE The WD_BLACK C50 Expansion Card for Xbox leverages the Xbox Velocity Architecture and delivers similar performance as your Xbox Series X|S internal storage for a seamless experience with all your favorite games.

STORE MORE HUGE TITLES Games are getting bigger, eating up more storage. Capacities from 512GB to 1TB[1] let you keep more of those titles installed and ready to fire up at a moment’s notice. EASY TO INSTALL This officially licensed Xbox expansion card is plug-and-play with your Xbox Series X|S, so you don’t have to worry about compatibility or opening your console to install. DESIGN BY WD_BLACK The expansion card’s slick, industrial aesthetics deliver the cool factor that WD_BLACK is known for and fit in perfectly with your Xbox console. STORE MORE, PLAY MORE ON XBOX Non-expansion card solutions require you to transfer games back and forth to your console. The WD_BLACK C50 Expansion Card for Xbox lets you get into the action faster so you can game when you want to QUICK-RESUME COMPATIBLE Suspend your current game, play a different game, then come back to the first game as if you never left. Only the Xbox console’s internal SSD and expansion cards can support this time-saving feature

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and as fast as internal!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the WD_Black 1TB C50 Storage Expansion Card for my Xbox Series X, and I must say it has been a game-changer in terms of storage convenience. The ease of use is one of its standout features. All I had to do was plug it into the dedicated expansion slot on my Xbox Series X, and it was instantly recognized and ready to use. No complicated setup or lengthy installations – it was truly a plug-and-play experience.What really impressed me, though, is that this storage expansion card matches the speed of the internal SSD in my Xbox Series X. I was worried that an external drive might compromise load times and game performance, but with the C50, I noticed no difference at all. Games load just as quickly as they do from the internal storage, and I can seamlessly switch between titles without missing a beat.The 1TB capacity is a significant boost to my storage capacity, allowing me to maintain a vast library of games without constantly juggling which ones to keep installed. This has improved my gaming experience, especially in a world where game file sizes keep growing.Overall, the WD_Black 1TB C50 Storage Expansion Card has made expanding my Xbox Series X's storage a breeze. Its ease of use and matching internal SSD speed make it a no-brainer for anyone looking to enhance their gaming experience without sacrificing performance. It's been a great addition to my setup, and I highly recommend it to fellow Xbox gamers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice product and good price will buy again

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use and worth it.
reviews.reviewText: If you own a Series S Xbox, this is definitely the product you need. I got a 512 GB expansion and that's all I really needed for the many games that I wanted to get and download. Definitely recommend you get this expansion card. It's sleek, compact, and plugs into the back of your console very neatly and nicely.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great SSD Storage for the Xbox Series Consoles
reviews.reviewText: I have a Xbox Series S 500gb. Which in reality is like 350gb total free space. For $75 for 500gb of storage, it’s a great deal. Works very well and is as fast as the internal storage of the Xbox Series S.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I had to erase a game every time I want to download a new one. I bought it for my Xbox Series and is easy to configure, once all games are moved to the disk the development of the consoles improves, decreasing the loading times and I don’t have to erase my favorite games!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cheaper than seagate, but still way too much for a gig
reviews.reviewText: Works exactly as expected. I plugged it in the back of my series x. It was immediately recognized and it’s as fast as the internal storage. really convenient way to hot swap games across multiple consoles. I just think that the price point for storage is a little ridiculous.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ease Of use
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly no issues. Easy setup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I received the XBox Series S as a gift and love it. However, the 500GB drive filled up quick and I found I had to delete games to load others so I purchased this. It was easy to install and set up. I also moved my existing games to it with no hassle. A great value.

Muy práctico, con decente capacidad y menos caro que las de SeagateExcelente para la Series S de 512gb, sale a mejor comprar precio la consola blanca más está tarjeta de expansión que la Series S de 1tb (al no ser que haya mejores ofertas en un futuro)
Es súper rapido y fácil de ocupar, excelente material, completamente nuevo

reviews.reviewTitle: Flawless performance, instant install no issues 10/10 plus more
reviews.reviewText: Works amazing, plug it in and immediately the Xbox knows what’s up and asked you a simple question and your all set, memory went from 99.9% full to all the sudden I have 250+ gigs free, no bs no transferring games, cheaper then Seagate and happy to have another option, will buy the 1tb next time. Free game pass and forza cars included gift code

O preço ainda está bastante salgado, mas o produto é fantástico. Fácil de usar e a velocidade de leitura é idêntica ao armazenamento original do Xbox. Pensando no tamanho dos jogos cada vez maiores e na facilidade para instalar títulos com o Game Pass, pra quem pode investir é uma ótima compra.
